titles.title: Providing for the adjournment of the House from Thursday, February 10, 1994, through Friday, February 18, 1994 to Tuesday, February 22, 1994 and an adjournment or recess of the Senate from Thursday, February 10, 1994 through Friday, February 18, 1994, to Tuesday, February 22, 1994.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 2/10/1994--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives and a recess or adjournment of the Senate from February 10 to February 22, 1994.
